pages.title: Lemon Tree
pages.text: Lemon Trees are found in the Plains biome, and Lemons can be obtained from its flowering leaves. The flowering leaves produce Lemons every so often.

pages.title: Hawthorn Tree
pages.text: Hawthorn Trees are found in the Forest biome, and Hawthorn Berries can be obtained from its flowering leaves. The flowering leaves produce Hawthorn Berries every so often.
